item.title: Orzala add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Orzala add a quote by Baltasar Gracian
item.description: "Never open the door to a lesser evil, for other and greater ones invariably slink in after it." -- Baltasar Gracian

item.title: Orzala add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Orzala add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Orzala add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "Why did you do all this for me?' he asked. 'I don't deserve it. I've never done anything for you.' 'You have been my friend,' replied Charlotte. 'That in itself is a tremendous thing." -- E.B. White

item.title: Orzala add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you obey all of the rules, you miss all of the fun." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Orzala add a quote by James Fenimore Cooper
item.description: "History, like love, is so apt to surround her heroes with an atmosphere of imaginary brightness." -- James Fenimore Cooper

item.title: Orzala add a quote by Jelaluddin Rumi
item.description: "Come, come, whoever you are. Wanderer, worshiper, lover of leaving. It doesn't matter. Ours is not a caravan of despair. come, even if you have broken your vows a thousand times. Come, yet again , come , come." -- Jelaluddin Rumi

item.title: Orzala add a quote by George Moore
item.description: "We humans are more complicated than animals, and we love through the imagination." -- George Moore
